Others: The Portland Trail Blazers led wire to wire in a 119-100 victory over the New Orleans Pelicans.
The Pelicans were without power forward Zion Williamson and Brandon Ingram due to injuries.
Anfernee Simons scored 17 points and Toumani Camara 15 for Portland.
Deandre Ayton scored 11 points and grabbed 13 rebounds for the Blazers.
CJ McCollum scored 23 points and Dejounte Murray 20 for New Orleans.
Herb Jones left the game in the third quarter due to a right shoulder injury.
